comment: Everything I want, but would love an ambient mode to save my LG G Watch R screen from burn in!
title: Great watch face

author: Euric Liew
comment: This watch definitely does not look anything like the advertised picture (except the one image showing a men wearing the Moto . It looks super 2D on my G Watch R. Not worth it, unless they can make the graphic looks MORE realistic than the built in "realistic" setting.

reply.author: Wixif
reply.content: The realism of the watch face is limited by your watch display quality. It will look more realistic when smartwatches get a higher resolution. Unfortunatly I cannot overcome hardware limitations with the app software. If you are not satisfied with the realism on your watch please use the refund possibility.
